=== Current Issues ===
* Microphone doesn't work. Not tested with Feisty, but alsa version is same on Feisty & Edgy at the time of this report. Update: Microphone works when OSS is used. It doesn't work with alsa.
* Webcam doesn't work (Bus 005 Device 003: ID 05ca:1830 Ricoh Co., Ltd).
